item.title: Continuous Ignition Selection System – Flap Actuated

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided continuous ignition is manually selected ON when required.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Select Continuous Ignition Switch ON when flaps are extended from the FLAPS UP position.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "____ FLAP CON IGN SELECTION INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
